name: Craig Ferguson
monologue: It's not just Friday. It's United Nations Day. The U.N. Is the world's foremost institution for drafting strongly worded letters.

name: Craig Ferguson
monologue: Critics have accused the U.N. of being indecisive. To that, the U.N. replied, "Uh, not true."

name: Craig Ferguson
monologue: Today in New York, a schoolteacher celebrated her 100th birthday. All of her students hid in the classroom and surprised her with a big party. They were hiding and they shouted, "Surprise!" May she rest in peace.

name: Craig Ferguson
monologue: Actually the 100-year-old teacher is fine. Today she was hired as a new reporter for "60 Minutes."
